title: Fertilize Blueberries

title: Fertilize Blueberries

title: Fertilize Blueberries
notes: Apply 100ml concentrate diluted: 10ml/L water in spring/summer (Sep-Feb), 5ml/L in autumn/winter (Mar-Aug)
